name: Extract_repairs_importances
description: Extract repairs importances from an anomaly detector execution

inputs.name: source_repair_flags
inputs.description: Source identifier of the repairs flag dataset

inputs.name: source_train
inputs.description: Source identifier for the training welds data

inputs.name: all_input_features
inputs.description: Input features list, contained into the training data and to be used as anomaly detection training

outputs.name: importance-datasets-output
outputs.description: Map containing references to the "repairs-importances" and  "normal-importances" and "train-ds-id" datasets respectively, containing importances data and the joined train dataset to be reused.
